title: Start
body:
Jake: Let's take a shortcut. We can reach home faster!

		Jenny: But it is too dark and I have a bad feeling if we take this shortcut.

		Jake: No worry! I think we will be safe if we go together, should we?

		[[No, the shortcut looks dangerous. Let's take the safer route.|NoShortcut]]

		[[Sure, if we can reach home faster, let's take this route.|Shortcut]]

title: NoShortcut
body:
Jenny: It's better to take a long way to go home because it is much safer.

		Jake: Ok, I guess you are right. Let's follow the safer road.

title: Shortcut
body: Getting hurt by barbed vine because the way is too dark and easily get hurt.
